extendedInfo.description: With 200 targeted multiple-choice questions and detailed explanations, Upward Mobilityâs Praxis II PLT K-6 app for Android is the perfect tool for on-the-go teaching professionals preparing for the Praxis II: Principles of Learning and Teaching K-6 exam.OVERVIEW:This module contains realistic teaching scenarios in a targeted curriculum of questions covering the required content areas for the Praxis II: PLT K-6 exam, including Students as Learners, Teacher Professionalism, Instruction and Assessment, and Communication Techniques. All questions were written exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers. Additionally, this app uses Upward Mobilityâs exclusive, intuitive interface. Read explanations as you go in Study Mode, or set a time limit and a number of questions in Test Mode.This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by ETS.ABOUT UPWARD MOBILITY:Upward Mobility is an independent test-preparation apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by writers who are subject matter experts and undergoes a thorough review process.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.

reviews.title: great study tool!
reviews.comment: I have been looking for a comprehensive study guide and this is awesome. As a teacher, I recommend this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Has some thinking questions but all of Blooms questions are at the old levels. Also some typos and spelling mistakes. Trying to figure out why I paid $4 for this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
